synopsis.text: Army, must destroy the Russian Pacific fleet before it can bring in reinforcements. Aboard the special flying ship Amanohara, a unique team of young girls known as the Raimu Unit prepares for battle. These girls possess the extraordinary ability to summon powerful spirits with their will. Enter Umakai Shintaro, a former diplomat turned teacher, who is tasked with guiding these girls on their mission. However, Shintaro's new role comes with unexpected challenges, including navigating the complexities of his past and the mysterious motives of the Russian Spiritual Corps. As the Amanohara soars through the skies, Shintaro and the Raimu Unit embark on a journey filled with danger, self-discovery, and unexpected encounters. Will they be able to turn the tides of war and emerge victorious? Join them on this thrilling adventure to find out.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
